extendedInfo.description: "Gate to the another world"AR ZombieGate is a 3D concept Game that opens up a new world through AR technology.- Defend zombies trying to get out from the world beyond the marker. - When a user opens the virtual gate through the marker, then another world of comic zombie characters will be seen. - Shoot and kill coming zombies. To target a zombie, a user should move around marker to control the viewfinder. - Get scores by killing zombies, and earn special items by destroying gravestones, bats and etc.- Each character has different speed and tolerance. Zombie composition will be differed by each level .- Considered various absorbing elements including fog effect. â» Recommended Marker Size : 1189mm X 841mm (A1 Size)â» Details info : http://arzombiegate.blogspot.com/[ Support Spec ] * supported some recent Android 2.2 and 2.3 devices * required a camera. * optimized in qualcomm snapdagon chipsets * optimized in 800X480 sized screen.[ Support model ] * PANTECH Vega series   (Vega , VegaXpress , SKY Vega S , Vega Racer) * Samsung Captivate (SGH-I897) * LG Ally , LG Optimus S , LG Optimus T , LG Vortex * Google Nexus One , Google Nexus S * Dell Streak 5 , Dell Streak 7 , Dell Venue * HTC Aria , HTC Bravo , HTC Desire , HTC Desire HD , HTC EVO 4G , HTC EVO Shift 4G , HTC G2 , HTC Incredible , HTC Inspire 4G , HTC MyTouch 3G Slide , HTC MyTouch 4G , HTC Thunderbolt * Huewei Ideos X5 * Motorola Atrix 4G , Motorola Backflip , Motorola Bravo , Motorola Charm , Motorola Defy , Motorola Droid , Motorola Droid 2 , Motorola Droid Pro , Motorola Droid X , Motorola Flipout , Motorola Flipside

reviews.title: crashes after looking at US $1 bill
reviews.comment: I open the app, have it look at the back of the US $1 bill, and it crashes within 2 seconds. WTF?  Running Android 4 on Motorola Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working..!!
reviews.comment: when i open the game it just shows me some \"agreemet\" but i cant do anything else..!? how do i get past this..?owh and its on the HTC wildfire s...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is the future of gaming. Works great with the back of a one dollar bill. Great way to show off to your friends and sing along \"I need a dollar, dollar...\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unsupported or not working.
reviews.comment: Is this game for Pantech devices only? I tried this on a Samsung Gtab2 10.1 and a Motorola xt897/photon Q On the tab, it said it wasn\'t supported. The Q just gave a black screen after the loading splash (camera not supported?) Both devices have Qualcomm chipsets that exceed the specified requirements. If this app is truly only for Pantech devices and not a tech demo, please consider allowing only Pantech devices to download this from Google Play.  Hah. Wasted color toner for nothing!
reviews.author: Quinn Lionheart

reviews.title: Totally awesome
reviews.comment: Coolest AR game yet, loads of fun.  I would pay for a version with more levels/upgrades etc.  Galaxy S2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and Addicting !!!
reviews.comment: Try printing the target in a large format !!! Great Game. Works on my T-Mobile MyTouch 4G .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy note compatability issues
reviews.comment: Resolution issue with galaxy note. Game works fine but ad is in centre of screen, gun and sights arevin top left, and but actual target is still centre of screen. Fix it and I love this game. Bring \'gate\' image up on a large screen and it\'s got great potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would not load
reviews.comment: Unfortunately the actual game would not start up, and the menu items were all squished together. Perhaps it\'s not set for this phone yet. HTC one
